items.content_html: A simple and lightweight browser proxy Chrome extension.
items.title: JustinLeei/FirewallBypass: A simple and lightweight browser proxy Chrome extension.

items.content_html: üìù NoteMgr CLI is a lightweight command-line tool for managing personal notes. It allows you to create, tag, view, search, and sync Markdown-based notes with GitHub Gists, all from your terminal. Ideal for developers and knowledge workers, NoteMgr is modular, efficient, and easy to customize.
items.title: austinwdigital/notemgr-cli: üìù NoteMgr CLI is a lightweight command-line tool for managing personal notes. It allows you to create, tag, view, search, and sync Markdown-based notes with GitHub Gists, all from your terminal. Ideal for developers and knowledge workers, NoteMgr is modular, efficient, and easy to customize.

items.content_html: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.
items.title: react18-tools/react-webgl-trails: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.

items.content_html: This RSS-API-Server is a Node.js-based API server built with TypeScript. It provides various endpoints for managing RSS feeds and user authentication, utilizing SQLite for data storage. The server is designed to be lightweight and efficient, making it suitable for integration with various applications.
items.title: OpCodeWolf/rss-api-server: This RSS-API-Server is a Node.js-based API server built with TypeScript. It provides various endpoints for managing RSS feeds and user authentication, utilizing SQLite for data storage. The server is designed to be lightweight and efficient, making it suitable for integration with various applications.

items.content_html: Lightweight HTTP framework with automatic headers
items.title: avoidwork/woodland: Lightweight HTTP framework with automatic headers

items.content_html: lightweight, zero-dependency library providing accurate navigation tracking, fixed document.referrer value, and complete history support for React frameworks. Fully compatible with Next.js, Remix, TanStack Query, and React Router.
items.title: hsuanyi-chou/react-page-tracker:  lightweight, zero-dependency library providing accurate navigation tracking, fixed document.referrer value, and complete history support for React frameworks. Fully compatible with Next.js, Remix, TanStack Query, and React Router.

items.content_html: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.
items.title: react18-tools/nextjs-darkmode: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.

items.content_html: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.
items.title: react18-tools/react-markdown-autolink: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.

items.content_html: Klaim is a lightweight TypeScript library designed to manage APIs and record requests, optimized for an optimal user experience.
items.title: antharuu/klaim: Klaim is a lightweight TypeScript library designed to manage APIs and record requests, optimized for an optimal user experience.

items.content_html: Kineval is a Javascript / ThreeJS implementation framework for web-based robot kinematics, dynamics, and autonomous control demonstrations. Kineval is compatible with ROSBridge and, as such, can be used to control actual robots through a lightweight interface.
items.title: JustinMLu/kineval-js: Kineval is a Javascript / ThreeJS implementation framework for web-based robot kinematics, dynamics, and autonomous control demonstrations. Kineval is compatible with ROSBridge and, as such, can be used to control actual robots through a lightweight interface.

items.content_html: A lightweight, unopinionated framework for building HTML5 multi-process desktop applications. It provides an event driven common service interface covering all service scopes from frontend to backend.
items.title: citkane/webview-bun-app: A lightweight, unopinionated framework for building HTML5 multi-process desktop applications. It provides an event driven common service interface covering all service scopes from frontend to backend.

items.title: elchininet/isometric: A lightweight JavaScript library, written in TypeScript, to create isometric projections using SVGs

items.content_html: Peek is a lightweight screen-sharing application that is designed for users to seamlessly share their screen for collaborative efforts.
items.title: qiubrandon/peek: Peek is a lightweight screen-sharing application that is designed for users to seamlessly share their screen for collaborative efforts.

items.content_html: Tabulify is a lightweight and flexible React table component designed for building customizable and feature-rich data tables. It supports features like pagination, row selection, and custom rendering.
items.title: arbasirian/tabulify: Tabulify is a lightweight and flexible React table component designed for building customizable and feature-rich data tables. It supports features like pagination, row selection, and custom rendering.
